name: Fish & Chips Maker Lite
description:
Prepare your own Fish & Chips a variety ingredients to choose from. All kind of sauces, vegetables, cheeses, meats and other specialities want to become a perfect Fish & Chips on your plate. No matter what part of the world you live, you're vegetarian or you love meat, you will find some delicacy of your taste. Serve the perfect dish on the plate of your choice and make it unique with some accessories. Add a personal message or a picture and send it to us in e-mail or share on facebook. Bon Appetit!
In the payed version available more items!
